welcome: This is an app for tracking your notes
errorTitleMin: Title must be at least 1 character long
errorTitleMax: Title cannot be more than 100 characters long.
errorDescriptionMin: Description must be at least 5 characters long.
errorDescriptionMax: Description cannot be more than 300 characters long.
errorCreating: Error in saving note, maybe note with such title exists
errorUpdating: Error updating note, maybe note with such title exists
